synopsis.text: Through a lifetime of being a sparring partner for his wrestler mother and sister, Kinjirou Sakamachi has developed an extreme case of gynophobia, causing him to bleed at the slightest touch from a girl. His life takes a dramatic turn when he stumbles upon a shocking revelation in the school restroom: the popular and handsome butler to the principal's daughter, Subaru Konoe, is actually a girl disguised as a boy. In exchange for keeping her secret, Subaru's mistress, Kanade Suzutsuki, vows to help Kinjirou overcome his crippling fear. As he navigates through a world of cross-dressing, ghostly encounters, and eccentric characters, Kinjirou embarks on a hilarious and chaotic journey to conquer his phobia and find his place in this unpredictable high school life.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
